mapper.select: select fsuId,fsuIp from xhgmnet_emh_login group by fsuId
select deviceId from xhgmnet_emh_config where fsuId=#{FSUID}
select count(*) from xhgmnet_emh_sensor_status where fsuId=#{FSUID}
select * from xhgmnet_emh_sensor_alarm where serialNo=#{serialNo} and fsuId=#{FSUID}
mapper.delete: delete from xhgmnet_emh_sensor_alarm where serialNo=#{serialNo} and fsuId=#{FSUID}
mapper.select: select deviceId,count(deviceId) as alarmNum from (select * from xhgmnet_emh_sensor_alarm where startTime BETWEEN #{startTime} and #{endTime} GROUP BY serialNo) as c GROUP BY deviceId
select alarmlevel,count(alarmlevel) as alarmNum from (select * from xhgmnet_emh_sensor_alarm where startTime BETWEEN #{startTime} and #{endTime} GROUP BY serialNo) as a GROUP BY alarmlevel
select * from xhgmnet_emh_nvrchannels where bsId=#{bsId}
mapper.update: update xhgmnet_emh_camera set deviceIP=#{FSUIP} where fsuId=#{FSUID}
mapper.select: select a.*,b.fsuId,b.siteId,b.fsuIp,c.alarmStatus,c.dataStatus from xhgmnet_bs_station as a LEFT JOIN (select x.fsuId,y.siteId,y.siteName,x.fsuIp from xhgmnet_emh_login as x LEFT JOIN xhgmnet_emh_config as y on x.fsuId=y.fsuId GROUP BY x.fsuId) as b on a.bsId=b.siteId LEFT JOIN xhgmnet_gps_voice.xhgmnet_emh_sensor_current as c on a.bsId=c.bsId where a.envMonitor!=2 and a.bsId<=2038 ORDER BY a.bsId

select * from ${currentMonth} where 1=1
and bsId=#{bsId}
and createTime between #{startTime} and #{endTime}
and ups1+0 between #{startUps1}+0 and #{endUps1}+0
and ups1+0 < #{endUps1}+0
and ups1+0 > #{startUps1}+0
and ups4+0 between #{startUps4}+0 and #{endUps4}+0
and ups4+0 < #{endUps4}+0
and ups4+0 > #{startUps4}+0
and e1+0 between #{startE1}+0 and #{endE1}+0
and e1+0 < #{endE1}+0
and e1+0 > #{startE1}+0
order by createTime desc limit #{start},#{limit}

select count(*) from ${currentMonth} where 1=1
and bsId=#{bsId}
and createTime between #{startTime} and #{endTime}
and ups1+0 between #{startUps1}+0 and #{endUps1}+0
and ups1+0 < #{endUps1}+0
and ups1+0 > #{startUps1}+0
and ups4+0 between #{startUps4}+0 and #{endUps4}+0
and ups4+0 < #{endUps4}+0
and ups4+0 > #{startUps4}+0
and e1+0 between #{startE1}+0 and #{endE1}+0
and e1+0 < #{endE1}+0
and e1+0 > #{startE1}+0
select sn,name from xhgmnet_emh_nvrChannels order by name
select bsId,deviceIP from xhgmnet_nvrstatus
select * from xhgmnet_emh_sensor_status order by updateTime desc limit 1
